explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the construction of a default discriminant model using various machine learning techniques.
explanations.supervised learning: The study involves building models to predict default risk, which is a supervised learning task as it uses labeled data.
explanations.classification: The paper focuses on discriminating the default risk of small enterprises, which is a classification problem.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper mentions the use of support vector machine (SVM) as one of the models in the optimal feature combinations.
explanations.SVM: SVM is explicitly mentioned as one of the models used in the study.
explanations.feature learning: The study involves selecting optimal feature combinations to improve model performance, which is related to feature learning.
explanations.feature representation: The paper discusses the importance of different features in the optimal feature combinations, which relates to feature representation.
